content: ðŸ¤”"We know we need AI, but we don't know where to start." We hear this from mid-sized company leaders every day. The AI landscape is overwhelming, with endless tools and approaches competing for attention. The problem isn't lack of optionsâ€”it's lack of clarity on what will actually drive business outcomes.
